remedies.name: Gentle body awareness
remedies.description: Spend a few minutes each day noticing how your body feels, without judgment, to build a kinder connection with your physical state.
remedies.safety_notes: This practice is not a substitute for medical care; always follow the guidance of your healthcare professionals.

remedies.name: Relaxed breathing breaks
remedies.description: Take short breaks during the day to breathe slowly and deeply for a few cycles, relaxing the shoulders and jaw.
remedies.safety_notes: If you have respiratory or cardiac conditions, breathe gently and within comfort.

remedies.name: Support health-related causes
remedies.description: Offer small, regular support to organizations that work for health, nutrition or healing for others.
remedies.safety_notes: Give only what is financially comfortable; intention matters more than amount.

remedies.name: Share nourishing food
remedies.description: Whenever possible, share fresh, simple, nourishing food with someone who may benefit from it.
remedies.safety_notes: Ensure hygiene and respect dietary restrictions of the recipient.

remedies.name: Kindness towards the body
remedies.description: Once a day, mentally thank your body for one thing it allowed you to do, reinforcing a more compassionate inner attitude.
remedies.safety_notes: This is a mindset practice and should never replace medical treatment.

remedies.name: Evening wind-down breathing
remedies.description: Before sleep, spend a few minutes breathing more slowly and gently, allowing the body to soften and release the day.
remedies.safety_notes: People with respiratory or cardiac conditions should keep the practice very gentle and consult professionals if unsure.

remedies.name: Support basic health supplies
remedies.description: Whenever feasible, contribute small amounts or items towards clean water, food or basic medical support for others.
remedies.safety_notes: Verify that any organisation or person you support is trustworthy; give only what feels sustainable for you.
